snippet.title: SONZAI ► Top Hat Studios Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
SONZAI is a story-rich, social link based RPG with combo character action & JRPG elements. Welcome to Kumotoshi: the only town in the world where magic exists. Draw strength from your friends and interact with the denizens of an always-moving, dynamic town by daylight, and juggle & rip through evil spirits with a vast array of combo-based weapons & skills at night. Thrust into new circumstances, and with an unlikely crew of companions, embark on a journey to uncover the secrets & scars of a place like no other.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1380980/Sonzai/
